tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_progression (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255),
    level INT,
    experience INT,
    quest_id INT,
    quest_name VARCHAR(255),
    quest_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE quest_completion (
    quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quest_name VARCHAR(255),
    completion_date DATE,
    player_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_progression(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_statistics (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    total_playtime INT,
    total_quests_completed INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_progression(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE quest_completion (
    quest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quest_name VARCHAR(50),
    completed_date DATE,
    player_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_progression(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rewards (
    reward_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reward_name VARCHAR(50),
    reward_type VARCHAR(20),
    quest_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (quest_id) REFERENCES quest_completion(quest_id)
);
